task.title: Creating a New Contact
task.abstract: Contacts are the people associated with an organization's business accounts. Each contact can store various kinds of information, such as phone numbers, addresses, titles, and roles. Similarly to the Accounts tab, the Contacts tab allows staff users to create and locate contacts, view and edit detailed information, and sort and filter contacts using standard and custom list views. Selecting the Email Opt Out and Do Not Call checkboxes will enable any further Email Opt Out and Do Not Call checkboxes.

step.cmd: Navigate to the Contacts tab in the eBusiness app and click New.
Enter the contact's First Name and Last Name.
Use the lookup field to select the related Account Name.
step.info: Enter any available information in the remaining fields.
